server.app.api package¶

Submodules¶

server.app.api.routes module¶

server.app.api.routes.get_game_data(room_id)¶

returns json with game_data

server.app.api.routes.get_game_field(room_id)¶

returns json with game_field data. use it only for testing

server.app.api.routes.get_players_stat(room_id)¶

returns json with players_stat data

server.app.api.routes.get_room_data(room_id)¶

returns json with game_data

server.app.api.routes.get_user_avatar(user_name)¶

API for getting user ave image

server.app.api.routes.get_user_games()¶

returns json with user games data.

Module contents¶

Initialization of BluePrints
